::Zardus/DevilDuer::

Zardus flies into the battle, firing at Shuko's back.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer and Perndabot slam into different boulders as the shots hit them. 
The shot at the base hits the shields. The base's comp beeps as the energy 
reserves get lower.

DevilDuer and Perndabot fire from behind their boulders along with the base 
defences, DevilDuer at Scattershot and Perndabot at Unitron.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bloodystrike is hit in the side, nearly crashing into the ground but 
regaining his balance. He jumps at Anubis, firing his gun and swinging his 
sword.
